name: Actors Playing Two Roles Multiple Choice Quiz | Mainly Actors | 10 Questions

questions.text: This 'M*A*S*H' actor played guest character Gen. Bartford Hamilton Steele before becoming a regular cast member.
questions.explanation:
Harry Morgan.

	He played Col. Potter, who replaced Lt. Col. Blake.

questions.text: She played her original character's daughter (3 times) on 'Star Trek: The Next Generation'.
questions.explanation:
Denise Crosby.

	Through a complicated time-travel scenario, an alternate of her Lt. Yar character went back in time and gave birth to a half-Romulan-half-Human daughter Sela.

questions.text: 'Law and Order': He played a character named Frank Lehrman in a second season episode before becoming a cast member the next year.
questions.explanation:
Jerry Orbach.

	He plays Detective Lennie Briscoe.

questions.text: He played an unnamed Romulan commander before becoming Spock's father on a later episode of 'Star Trek' and in several ST movies.
This actor played guest character Detective Sal Benedetto 5 times, then returned two years later as the regular character Lieutenant Norman Buntz on 'Hill Street Blues'.
This character actor played 7 different Japanese characters on 'McHale's Navy' and 4 different Korean characters on 'M*A*S*H'.
She played Princess Astra on Dr. Who, episode 'The Armageddon Factor', then returned as the regenerated Time Lord and The Doctor's travelling companion Romana.
questions.explanation:
Lalla Ward.

	She married her 'Dr. Who' co-star Tom Baker for 16 months.

questions.text: 'Gunsmoke': This actor played Jim Buck, the stagecoach driver, for several seasons in the 1950's and 1960's, then returned in the last season as Floyd the bartender.

Name one of the following TV series: The star actress plays a blonde woman who can perform magic. The same actress also plays a brunette relative of the main character, also magical, who like to play havoc with her relatives life with mortals.
questions.explanation:
I dream of jeannie & bewitched.

	Barbara Eden played Jeannie and her evil sister Jeannie. Elizabeth Montgomery played Samantha Stephens and her meddling cousin Serena. (Serena was always credited as being played by Pandora Spocks.)
